product_name: Menasha Ridge Press The Best in Tent Camping: Southern California - 4th Edition
long_description: For tent campers who like quiet, scenic and serene campsites, this updated edition of The Best in Tent Camping directs you to 50 of the best Southern California has to offer.
short_description: For tent campers who like quiet, scenic and serene campsites, this updated edition of The Best in Tent Camping directs you to 50 of the best Southern California has to offer.
